p: Data from DHIS were extracted as pivot tables into Excel spread sheet, analysed and presented quantitatively in tables and graphs using descriptive statistics. Atlas.ti software was used to analyse the qualitative data supported by the basic steps of descriptive analysis to analyse qualitative data: coding, analysis and description (Friese 2012). The researcher read and re-read the transcribed data until themes emerged. Themes were then grouped into codes according to the similarity and later classified into categories.
